data.title: Haan → Amsterdam-Centraal by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Haan to Amsterdam-Centraal in 3h 6m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Haan to Amsterdam-Centraal today.
data.text:
Thinking about taking the train from Haan to Amsterdam-Centraal? We’ve got you covered.

It usually takes around 4 hours 36 minutes to travel the 122 miles (196 km) from Haan to Amsterdam-Centraal by train, although you can get there in as little as 3 hours 6 minutes on the fastest services. You’ll normally find around 41 trains per day running on this route. You’ll need to make 1 change along the way as there aren't any direct services on this line. You can travel on this route with either Thalys, ICE or DB. As the main train operators on this route, all offer comfortable seating and plenty of space for luggage as standard.

Train tickets from Haan to Amsterdam-Centraal are usually cheaper when you book in advance compared to buying them on the day. Start a search in our Journey Planner to check out the latest prices.

Keen to book your train tickets to Amsterdam-Centraal? No need to wait, start a search with us today! If you want to find out a bit more about the journey first, you can find our train timetable below, tips on booking cheap tickets and our FAQs, including first and last train times.
